I think you might enjoy "American Sniper" (2014) - not only is it a powerful and intense war movie, but Bradley Cooper's performance as Chris Kyle is also incredibly compelling. The film takes you on a thrilling ride from the battlefield to Chris's personal struggles back home, and it's a great portrayal of the emotional toll of war.

If you're in the mood for something a bit more historical and romantic, "The English Patient" (1992) might be up your alley. This epic romance is set against the backdrop of World War II and features stunning cinematography, as well as memorable performances from Juliette Binoche and Ralph Fiennes.
